Leaflet BlurredLocationDisplay | by Public Lab

This library is designed to allow locations to be displayed but with a degree of "blur" -- obscuring exact location in cases where some privacy is needed. Locations are represented as latitude and longitude, but truncated to a precision as indicated by the highlighted region on the map shown. Leaflet.BlurredLocationDisplay This page shows the style : heatmap property of this library which results in only colored grids without any markers .
